table.name: presentity_extensions
table.description: Table holding extension elements (non-PIDF) published directly in <presence>.

column.name: dbid
column.description: Generated ID used for unique identification.

column.name: pres_id
column.description: Presentity ID for which is given extension element.

column.name: etag
column.description: Entity tag used for note publication.

column.name: element
column.description: Whole extension element in serialized form.

column.name: expires
column.description: Expiration value of extension element i.e. value of Expires header used in PUBLISH.
